name: Villager's Ambition
description:
Defeat the other village in a game about gathering resources and upgrading your village.

- How to play -

Use the arrows to move your cursor through the menu.

Change the day by selecting it with (A) to make some progress.

During the night, a random event will happen. Choose an option to continue with the story.

- Goal -

Defeat the other village in as few days as possible.

Palette used: Endesga 16

Made by AtsushiHdez - 2022
